# InputTargetType

Indicates whether the additional seller input is at the item or shipment level.

## Enum

* `SHIPMENT_LEVEL` (value: `'SHIPMENT_LEVEL'`)

* `ITEM_LEVEL` (value: `'ITEM_LEVEL'`)
